Label: Event acronym
Description: An acronym used as a short form of the name of an event or series of events given in the <EventName> element. Optional, and repeatable to provide parallel acronyms for a single event in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <EventAcronym>, but must be included in each instance if <EventAcronym> is repeated.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 20 characters</dd>
